Title: Honouring indigenous art
Content: On August 7, 1905, Indian freedom fighters launched the Swadeshi movement, asking Indians to boycott British goods. Over a hundred years later, the movement continues to promote traditional arts, craf
Author: Zahra Amiruddin
Description: On August 7, 1905, Indian freedom fighters launched the Swadeshi movement, asking Indians to boycott British goods. Over a hundred years later, the movement continues to promote traditional arts, craf
